text: "We Work the Black Seam" is a 1986 song by Sting and is the sixth single from his debut studio album The Dream of the Blue Turtles. It was released as a single in Germany, New Zealand and Australia. The song expresses about the miners strike in the United Kingdom in 1984 and 1985. == References == Category:1986 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Jazz rock songs Category:Sting (musician) songs
title: We Work the Black Seam
